column1: Little Goat Diner////It's been a long time coming for this review. I'm glad to say
column2: that time has come. Little Goat is NOTHING like I expected. In my mind
column4: purposely decorated to look dingy like an old time diner. If I had walked into a place like this
column5: I wouldn't have been disappointed. However
column7: and I definitely wasn't disappointed with what I saw.
